module calculator_mod
    implicit none
    type Calculator
        integer :: k
        integer :: answer = 0
        logical :: isCalculate = .false.
        type(NodeChildren), allocatable :: nodes(:)
    contains
        procedure :: calculate
        procedure :: dfs
    end type

    type NodeChildren
        integer, allocatable :: children(:)
    end type

contains

    function new_Calculator(n, k, as) result(this)
        integer, intent(in) :: n, k
        integer, intent(in) :: as(0:)
        type(Calculator) :: this
        integer :: i, j

        this%k = k
        allocate(this%nodes(0:n-1)) do i = 0, n-1
            allocate(this%nodes(i)%children(0))  ! Initialize empty
            this%nodes(i)%children = [integer ::]
        end do

        do i = 0, n-1
            j = as(i)
            if (i > 0) then
                call append_to_array(this%nodes(j)%children, i)
            else
                if (j > 0) then
                    this%answer = this%answer + 1
                end if
            end if
        end do
    end function

    subroutine append_to_array(arr, val)
        integer, allocatable, intent(inout) :: arr(:)
        integer, intent(in) :: val
        integer, allocatable :: tmp(:)
        integer :: n

        n = size(arr)
        allocate(tmp(n+1))
        tmp(1:n) = arr
        tmp(n+1) = val
        call move_alloc(tmp, arr)
    end subroutine

    integer function calculate(this)
        class(Calculator), intent(inout) :: this
        if (.not. this%isCalculate) then
            call this%dfs(0, 0)
            this%isCalculate = .true.
        end if
        calculate = this%answer
    end function

    recursive function dfs(this, a, pre) result(h)
        class(Calculator), intent(inout) :: this
        integer, intent(in) :: a, pre
        integer :: h, child, max_h

        h = 0
        do i = 1, size(this%nodes(a)%children)
            child = this%nodes(a)%children(i)
            max_h = this%dfs(child, a)
            if (max_h > h) then
                h = max_h
            end if
        end do

        if (pre > 0) then
            if (h == this%k - 1) then
                h = 0
                this%answer = this%answer + 1
            else
                h = h + 1
            end if
        else
            h = h + 1
        end if
    end function dfs

end module calculator_mod
